topics.title: Removing Probe from Combined Measurement
topics.description: Distinguishing between what's on the right-hand side and creating a file for it.
evidence_quotes: [00:36:18.980 → 00:36:22.980] And so what will be left is just the DUT measurement.
[00:37:14.980 → 00:37:17.980] So we remove the contribution to the probe.
